name: Idle Evolution
description: A game combination of genres time-manager / strategy / educational. Simple and addictive whose currency are the atoms and the goal is to have their control and reach the final evolution. God created the world in 6 days... and you?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP 64bits Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics should be fine Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10  64bits Processor: Core i5 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD dedicated graphics with 1GB VRAM Storage: 300 MB available space
